thread.section_title: Smith Thompson Home Security Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Smith Thompson Home Security | smiththompson.com
thread.title: Jeb
thread.title_full: Smith Thompson Home Security reviewed by Jeb

author: Jeb
title: Jeb
text: My wife and I did our research thoroughly prior to our decision to go with Smith Thompson. Not to be confused with Smith Monitoring, Smith Thompson had the best reviews, no contracts, and best rates around. On time as promised. Gary, the technician, came out and finished the work within one half an hour then gave us an in-depth explanation on the functionality of the system. We had questions in regards to adding more features to the system but with honest answers he explained to us how it was NOT needed. Other companies would've jumped on the chance to sell us unneeded features, where Gary was honest enough not to do so. Highly recommend!
